== About Me ==

Roozbeh Shafiee borned in 29th May 1987 in Isfahan-IRAN and he is 27 years old right now. His professes are about linux systems administration and python development. he is living in Tehran-IRAN and his job is virtualization architect and linux systems administrator in a telecommunication company. he uses linux since 2003 (Fedora Core) and uses ubuntu since version of 6.06 . He loves communities based on open source technologies and he is member of Iranian Ubuntu LoCo team since April 2009 and contributes in some of open source projects.
